roleset.name: find (out)

role.descr: attribute on arg1 (found out to be/as what)

example.name: discover an NP
example.text: Intel said that last week a customer discovered two flaws in its 80486 microprocessor chip's ``floating-point unit'', a set of circuits that do certain calculations.
example.arg: two flaws in its 80486 microprocessor chip 's `` floating-point unit '' , a set of circuits that do certain calculations

example.name: discover an SBAR
example.text: But when they discover that markets aren't always as liquid as they supposed -- markets jump.
example.arg: that markets aren't always as liquid as they supposed

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: John discovered for Mary the set of books that he'd borrowed from her years earlier.
example.arg: the set of books that he'd borrowed from her years earlier

example.name: with attribute
example.text: John-1 was discovered *trace*-1 to be criminally insane.

roleset.note: Based on financial subcorpus; adjectival 'discovered' based on BOLT-7. Comparison with find (out). Member of VNcls discover-84, conjecture-29.5-2, sight-30.2.

example.name: adjectival rel: discovered
example.text: There is no new background or new development that-1 [*-1] is newly discovered or different from what the public experienced in the past .
